agentData.mission: Develop a detailed, testable experimental framework to probe and extend the DMNâ€“ECN account of creative generation vs. evaluation in ecologically valid, domain-specific artistic practice. The framework should integrate multimodal neuroimaging (fMRI/EEG), real-world creative tasks across art forms, candidate neurofeedback/noninvasive-stimulation interventions, longitudinal performance metrics, and plans for assessing transfer, individual differences, and cultural/expertise effects.
